sudoku.name: Sudoku
sudoku.helpGoalText: Fill in a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, row, and 3×3 section contain the numbers between 1 to 9.
sudoku.helpPlayText: In a new game start, the 9×9 grid will have some of the squares filled in. You can use logic to fill in the missing digits and complete the grid.
sudoku.helpLi1: Any row contains more than one of the same number.
sudoku.helpLi2: Any column contains more than one of the same number.
sudoku.helpLi3: Any 3×3 grid contains more than one of the same number.

guess.name: Guess Number
guess.helpText1: You need to guess 4 different numbers.
guess.helpText3: For example 5678. If you guess 0128, you can get 1A0B. If you guess 5627, you can get 2A1B
guess.helpText4: Every game has 8 times to guess.
guess.helpText5: Less times guessed right, more stars got.

slide.name: Slide
slide.helpText1: You can use a finger swipe to look for more than three pieces of digital color that are connected together and erase it.
